thread.title: Children Services was actively investigating woman accused of killing 5-year-old daughter
thread.title_full: Children Services was actively investigating woman accused of killing 5-year-old daughter

author: Adam Ferrise, cleveland.com
title: Children Services was actively investigating woman accused of killing 5-year-old daughter

organizations.name: cuyahoga county children and family services

text: Cuyahoga County Children and Family Services caseworkers visited a Cleveland mother eight times in the five weeks leading up to death of her 5-year-old daughter, officials said.
